aboutUs.title: About
aboutUs.text: The Bitcoin mining token (BTCMT) brings liquidity to Bitcoin mining. Each BTCMT is collateralized by 0.01 TH/s of real Bitcoin mining power. By staking BTCMT, holders will earn daily staking rewards in Bitcoin that correspond to the mining power staked.
aboutUs.text2: Get transparent farming rewards as if you had an ASIC-setup or make a profit by buying and selling any amount of mining power without dealing with traditional mining.
aboutUs.text3: The economy of the BTCMT token allows you to get significantly more income than from traditional mining. Yield farming on HECO Chain offers one of the highest APRs in DeFi.
aboutUs.auditText: rated MINTO Contract infrastructure on the highest security level

stacking.title: Staking
stacking.text1: The DeFi space is evolving every day. Decentralized protocols and projects strive to improve the investors` experience and attract more liquidity.
stacking.text2: BTCMT is an asset protocol that brings Bitcoin hashrate assets to DeFi.
stacking.text3: Stake your BTCMT and earn up to 236% yearly in daily payouts. Yield farming in DeFi is far more profitable than bitcoin mining or purchasing. Earn even more in a growing market and don`t lose anything even after a 70% drop

datacenters.title: Our data centers
datacenters.text: We looked far and wide to find the perfect place to host our project; it had to be up to the highest international technological standards and it had to be capable of expanding as our project grew.
datacenters.text2: Our project is hosted in a gem we found in the Republic of Karelia. The 86,000 square foot, brand new data center is in an ideal location that has enabled us to cut operation costs down to a minimum, thanks to a stable 1Gbit internet connection, smooth logistics and the suitable climate in the region.
datacenters.text3: The facility and operation are in complete compliance with local and international regulations, and the site is maintained by a team of over 150 experienced technicians.

slide.one: The center’s overall energy capacity is 64.5 MW. The facility has been equipped with 31 000 ASIC miners, with over 50 000 THs of mining power allocated to Minto. Those figures will increase as the project grows.
slide.two: The data center was built using the most modern technologies, materials and equipment. This guarantees long-term reliability and stability.
slide.three: The data center is capable of using any equipment model, including GPUs. In the future, this will allow Minto to issue tokens for mining altcoins.
slide.four: The facility’s extra square footage opens up opportunities for further scaling and construction of a second 120 MW data center.
